Commercial LED Lighting Retrofit

Upgrade commercial lighting for better visibility, safer spaces, and lower maintenance. We plan fixture types and controls and phase installs around operations.

Licensed & insured MI License #631210 2-year warranty Clean, code-aware workmanship
Call now Book online Text WhatsApp
Outcome

Better light, lower maintenance

  • Improved visibility and safety
  • Lower energy use vs. outdated fixtures
  • Fewer lamp/ballast failures and lift rentals
  • Cleaner, more consistent lighting output
Best candidates

Where retrofits shine

  • High bays / low bays
  • Parking lots & exterior wall packs
  • Shop/task lighting
  • Offices, halls, restrooms
AEO quick answer

How long does a retrofit take?

Many projects can be phased area-by-area to keep operations running, with scheduling around your hours and access needs.

Process

Our retrofit process

  1. Walkthrough + goals: brightness targets, problem areas, operating hours.
  2. Plan + scope: fixture types, controls, access plan (lifts, lanes, staging).
  3. Installation: clean wiring, proper mounting, testing, cleanup.
  4. Handoff: labeling, control settings, recommended spares/maintenance cadence.

Prefer a maintenance-first approach? See commercial maintenance.

FAQs

Quick answers

How disruptive is a retrofit?
Most projects can be phased by area. We plan access, staging, and scheduling around your business hours.
Do you install controls and sensors?
Yes, where appropriate. We can scope occupancy sensors, dimming, and switching logic that fits the space.
Will you replace exterior parking lot lights?
Yes. We can evaluate exterior lighting for safety and consistency and scope fixture replacements.
Can you retrofit a warehouse or shop space?
Yes. High bay and task lighting retrofits are common. We plan layout and brightness targets first.
Do you provide a plan before starting?
Yes. You’ll get clear scope and options before installation begins.

Need help today?

Call for urgent troubleshooting or schedule planned work via booking.
